ohu sandahan kale pasugiya 2013 warshaye janawari masayedi thaman mema kuda guwan yanaya yoshitha rajapakshata thagi kala bawayi hiru prawruththi anshayata adahas dakwamin ohu wadiduratath kiya sitiye.kese wethath halawatha - bangadeniya - dematapitiya pradeshaye padinchi hamlat matis wadiduratath sandahan kale paudgalika guwan yana guwan gathakirimata rajaya thahanam kirimath samaga re wijewardhana, guwan yanaya puhunu pasalakata labadun bawayi.pasugiya angaharuwada polis hadisi amathum anshayata lada thorathurakata anuwa narahenpita aarthika madhyasthanaye gabadawaka thibi dedenekuta pamanak gaman kala haki mema kuda guwan yanaya soya ganu labuwa.
